data.message: Why is your main picture devil horns while covering one eye?  Oh that's right, the whole satanic illuminati thing.

replies.message: Or maybe it's just to keep religious fanatics like you away.
Arikan Axisa I'm not even religious, let alone fanatic. lol. Keep guessing as to who I am because I'm sure all of the info is certainly in that one comment.

I'm dumb? Your whole comment lacks proper grammar, spelling, and punctuation. I'm sure you would blame it on not being in English class rather than your clear lack of intelligence. 
However, if that's the case, you're just incredibly lazy.

Eminem sold his soul... The Illuminati owns his ass... These idiots that argue you are stupid sheep... I stoped listening to Em his a hater of peace, acting like a spoilt child throwing tantrums rebelling against everything to please the Illuminati, problem is he's a grown/old ass MF and it doesn't suit him anymore... But due to high demand from his sheep he will continue... This is my views, I'm not a Trump supporter I'm African I have never even been in the USA...
We're just sopposed to ignore that!
